Text: Anyone got something from these guys to share? Very interesting in Pentagram/Deathrow/Bedemon etc. in general everything B. Liebling has participated in.

I have some generic Pentagram stuff. I have Sub-Basement, Be Forewarned, and Relentless. 

I'm downloading First Daze Here (the original) right now, and plan on buying the new First Daze Here Too and Day of Reckoning.

Thanks for sharing this, Pentagram kicks ass! I'm trying to get the guy to reseed the Pentagram VCD on here.
